testimonial1.name: Sophie Martin
testimonial1.text: Creating our digital booklets has transformed how we communicate with our guests. No need to print with every change, and our clients access all info via their smartphone. Huge time saver!

testimonial2.name: Pierre Lambert
testimonial2.text: The integrated MGD assistant answers our clients' questions even at night. No need to have someone at reception 24/7. Our travelers are autonomous and we save hours of work every week.

testimonial3.name: Marie Dubois
testimonial3.text: The customization of colors and design allows us to create booklets that perfectly match our identity. Our clients love the modern and intuitive interface. The QR code is a real plus for quick access!

testimonial4.name: Jean Tremblay
testimonial4.text: The consultation statistics give us a clear vision of what our clients are really looking for. We can adapt our booklets based on the most viewed modules. It's a valuable tool for improving the customer experience!

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about My Guide Digital
faq.a1: My Guide Digital is an AI-powered digital welcome booklet that centralizes all useful information for your travelers and makes them autonomous during their stay.
faq.q2: Who is My Guide Digital for?
faq.a2: My Guide Digital is for Airbnb hosts, concierge managers and travel professionals who want to digitize their welcome and optimize their relationship with travelers.
faq.q3: What are the main benefits for an Airbnb host?
faq.a3: An Airbnb host can create a professional welcome booklet in minutes, reduce repetitive questions, save several hours per week and increase their 5-star reviews thanks to My Guide Digital.
faq.q4: How does My Guide Digital's AI help me daily?
faq.a4: My Guide Digital's AI automatically answers your travelers' frequently asked questions, guides them in using the accommodation or services and avoids you being constantly solicited.
faq.q5: Can I test My Guide Digital for free?
faq.a5: Yes, you can test the solution for free using the "Try the solution for free" button present in several places on the site.
faq.q6: How does My Guide Digital improve the customer experience?
faq.a6: By providing clear and instant access to all information, My Guide Digital improves traveler comfort, reduces friction and helps you get more 5-star reviews.
faq.q7: Is My Guide Digital suitable for concierges with multiple properties?
faq.a7: Yes, My Guide Digital allows concierge managers to automate communication for multiple accommodations and standardize welcome quality across the entire portfolio.
faq.q8: Does My Guide Digital help reduce my operational costs?
faq.a8: By automating responses and digitizing the welcome booklet, My Guide Digital reduces time spent on traveler support and therefore your operational costs.
faq.q9: Is there an affiliate or referral program with My Guide Digital?
faq.a9: Yes, you can offer a promo code to your community to give them 15% off the subscription, which allows you to earn money with My Guide Digital.
faq.q10: Where can I find My Guide Digital pricing and terms of use?
faq.a10: Pricing is available via the "Our Pricing" page and legal information via the "Legal Notice" and "Terms and Conditions" pages at the bottom of the site.

airbnb.title: For Airbnb hosts
airbnb.subtitle: Simplify your rental management and offer an exceptional experience to your travelers
airbnb.whyTitle: Why choose My Guide Digital for your Airbnb rental?
airbnb.why1: As an Airbnb host, you know how important it is to provide a memorable experience to your travelers. My Guide Digital allows you to create personalized digital welcome guides that make life easier for your guests and yourself.
airbnb.why2: No need to print documents on each arrival. A simple QR code allows your travelers to instantly access all the information they need: house rules, local recommendations, WiFi codes, and much more.

time.title: Time saving
time.description: Create your guide once, use it for all your reservations. Update information in real time without reprinting.

autonomy.title: Traveler autonomy
autonomy.description: The MGD assistant answers frequently asked questions 24/7, reducing the number of messages you receive.

professional.title: Professionalism
professional.description: Show your guests that you are a professional host with a modern and well-organized guide.

multilang.title: Multi-language
multilang.description: Welcome travelers from around the world by offering your guide in multiple languages.
